abstract: Apple’s sputtering efforts to be a major purveyor of video downloads may get a boost in 2008 from an agreement with 20th Century Fox for digital movie rentals.
snippet: Apple’s sputtering efforts to be a major purveyor of video downloads may get a boost in 2008 from an agreement with 20th Century Fox for digital movie rentals.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Apple’s sputtering efforts to be a major purveyor of video downloads may get a boost in 2008 from an agreement with 20th Century Fox for digital movie rentals.

headline.main: Apple Making Deals for Web Video Rentals
headline.print_headline: Apple Making Deals for Web Video Rentals
